_header: He that will read over this book
Note: For the A and B Texts see 2859 and 6650.
Subjects: treatises, devotional; charters, of Christ; allegories
_description: The ‘Long Charter of Christ:’ C Text — 618 lines

BLRoy17Cxvii.First Lines:
He þat wyll rede ouer þis boke& with hys gostli high
                    þer yn loke…
BLRoy17Cxvii.Last Lines:
…Vnto þat blis he vs bryngÞat of noght made all
                    thyng
BLRoy17Cxvii.Note:
Affected by damp; text partially recovered through use of cold light
                    source.

Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             The Minor Poems of the Vernon Manuscript, Part 2.
